# localName

**Instance Property**

Returns the local name of the receiver.

## Declaration

```swift
var localName: String? { get }
```

## Return Value

A string containing the local name of the receiver.

## Discussion

The local name is the part of a node name that follows a namespace-qualifying colon or the full name if there is no colon. For example, “chapter” is the local name in the qualified name “acme:chapter”.

## Managing Namespaces

- **localName(forName:)**: Returns the local name from the specified qualified name.
- **prefix**: Returns the prefix of the receiver’s name.
- **prefix(forName:)**: Returns the prefix from the specified qualified name.

items.description: Returns the local name from the specified qualified name.
items.name: localName(forName:)

items.description: Returns the prefix of the receiver’s name.
items.name: prefix

items.description: Returns the prefix from the specified qualified name.
items.name: prefix(forName:)
